NotFoundPage.Title: Ops!... this page is not available
NotFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.

TermsPage.Title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.NoticeDescription: This application is a personal project built for educational and portfolio purposes. It does not host, stream, or distribute any copyrighted content. All data is pulled from external public APIs for interface testing and UI/UX demonstration only.
TermsPage.Section1Description: This project serves as a demonstration of frontend technologies such as Next.js, TypeScript, and third-party API integration. It is not intended for public use or media consumption.
TermsPage.Section2Description: This app is provided "as is" for experimentation and learning. There are no guarantees regarding uptime, accuracy of data, or stability of features. Any usage is at your own discretion.
TermsPage.Section3Description: All movie and TV information shown in this project is fetched from public APIs such as TMDB. This project does not claim any ownership of the media or data retrieved.
TermsPage.Section4Description: While efforts are made to display accurate information, data may be outdated or incomplete due to reliance on external sources. We are not responsible for any inaccuracies presented.
TermsPage.Section5Description: This app is non-commercial. It is not monetized, does not collect user data, and does not offer paid features. Its sole intent is to showcase frontend development skills.
TermsPage.Section6Description: All logos, posters, and media belong to their respective copyright holders. This project includes references for design and functionality only, not for redistribution.
TermsPage.Section7Description: These terms may be updated if the project evolves or becomes publicly deployed. Continued usage after updates implies your acceptance of any revised terms.

PrivacyPage.Title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.IntroDescription: This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle information in this educational demonstration project. Note that this is a demonstration and does not collect personal data beyond what is necessary for functionality.
PrivacyPage.Section1ListItem1: We may temporarily store browsing preferences
PrivacyPage.Section1ListItem2: No personal identifiable information is permanently stored
PrivacyPage.Section1ListItem3: Third-party APIs may collect data per their own policies
PrivacyPage.Section2ListItem3: No data is sold or shared with third parties beyond API providers
PrivacyPage.Section3Description: This demo relies on third-party APIs. Please refer to their privacy policies for details on data handling.
PrivacyPage.Section4Description: We may update this policy at any time. Changes will be reflected on this page.

DmcaPage.Title: DMCA Notice
DmcaPage.IntroDescription: This is an educational demonstration project that does not host any content. All content is fetched from third-party APIs. DMCA notices should be directed to the respective content owners or hosting services.
DmcaPage.Section1Note: This application is a frontend demonstration that:
DmcaPage.Section1ListItem1: Does not host or store any media content
DmcaPage.Section1ListItem2: Uses third-party APIs for educational purposes only
DmcaPage.Section1ListItem3: Has no control over the content provided by these APIs
DmcaPage.Section1ListItem4: May be discontinued at any time
DmcaPage.Section2ListItem1: Identify the specific content in question
DmcaPage.Section2ListItem2: Contact the actual hosting service or content owner
DmcaPage.Section2ListItem3: Submit DMCA notices to the appropriate content provider
DmcaPage.Section3Description:
While we do not host content, if you have questions about our educational demonstration, contact us at:
Email: mah.fawzy96@gmail.com
DmcaPage.DisclaimerDescription: We are not responsible for any content displayed through third-party APIs. This is purely an educational demonstration of frontend development techniques.

ContentRemovalPage.Title: Content Removal
ContentRemovalPage.IntroDescription: This is an educational demonstration project. We do not host or store any media content. All content removal requests should be directed to the appropriate content owners or hosting services.
ContentRemovalPage.Section1Item1: We do not host any media content
ContentRemovalPage.Section1Item2: Content is displayed through third-party APIs
ContentRemovalPage.Section1Item3: We have no control over the content provided by these services
ContentRemovalPage.Section1Item4: This project is for educational purposes only
ContentRemovalPage.Section2Description: If you wish to have content removed:
ContentRemovalPage.Section2Item1: Identify the specific content in question
ContentRemovalPage.Section2Item2: Determine which third-party service is hosting the content
ContentRemovalPage.Section2Item3: Contact the appropriate content host or owner directly
ContentRemovalPage.Section3Description: Content removal requests should be directed to the respective content owners or hosting services. We cannot process content removal requests as we do not host or control any media content.
ContentRemovalPage.Section4Description: This application may be discontinued at any time as it exists solely for educational and demonstration purposes. We are not responsible for any content displayed through third-party APIs.
ContentRemovalPage.Section5Description:
For questions about this educational demonstration, contact:
Email: mah.fawzy96@gmail.com

Footer.description1: Dive into the world of cinema with FilmO'Clock. Explore trending movies, discover TV shows across genres, and never miss upcoming releases. Your entertainment hub, anytime, anywhere.
Footer.description2: Movies, TV Shows, Streaming, Reviews, Actors, Actresses, Photos, Ratings, Synopsis, Trailers, Teasers, Credits, Cast
Footer.disclaimer: This site does not store any files on its server. All contents are provided by non-affiliated third parties.

MainPage.Title: Film O'Clock
MainPage.Description: Film OClock is your ultimate movie companion â€” discover, track, and explore the latest movies and TV shows with stunning visuals, personalized watchlists, and multi-language support. Your next favorite film is just a tick away!
